requirements: Prerequisites: PHYS 201 and MATH 120, and one astronomy course numbered above 200. Taught in alternate years.
description:
A survey of the contents, structure, kinematics, dynamics, and evolution of galaxies; galaxy interactions and the environments of galaxies; properties of active galactic nuclei.
Prerequisites: PHYS 201 and MATH 120, and one astronomy course numbered above 200. Taught in alternate years.
title: Galaxies
